name: Alex Morgan
persona: Alex is a third-year Psychology major who has faced some academic challenges but remains determined to improve. With a CGPA of 2.76, Alex is motivated to do better, showing steady perseverance and a moderate level of self-discipline. While test anxiety can sometimes get in the way, Alex’s commitment to long-term goals and belief in their ability to succeed help them push through setbacks. Alex is actively seeking strategies to boost study habits and manage stress more effectively.
